import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Category=props=>{const[seeAll,setSeeAll]=useState(false);const handleClick=event=>{setSeeAll(!seeAll);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("section",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"category sub-heading",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"heading",children:"Categories"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"btn",onClick:handleClick,children:seeAll?"See Less":"See All"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"categories  ".concat(seeAll?'categories-all':''),children:categoriesData.map(category=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:"category-item-parent",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CategoryItem,{bgColor:category.bgColor,bgImage:category.bgImage,ciName:category.name,seeAll:seeAll},category.id)},"li"+category.id))})]});};export default Category;
